title: Nigeria Unveils Plans to Revolutionize Digital Infrastructure and AI Development
description: To speed up Nigeria’s digital transformation, the Federal Government has unveiled plans to upgrade digital infrastructure and incorporate AI for the country’s development. Led by Minister of Communication, Innovation, and Digital Economy Dr. Bosun Tijani, these measures reflect the government’s priority of putting Nigeria on a path to global digital economy leadership. Digital infrastructure fund […]

title: South Korea’s Strategic Investment in AI to Revolutionize Public Services
description: In a recent statement, South Korea outlined its plans to invest in the adoption of AI technologies for productivity instrumentalization in state-run organizations. The South Korean government has selected a large allocation of 710.2 billion won (about US$526 million) for this project, which is one clear indicator of its intention to efficiently deploy AI technology […]
